title: Self-Directed Training Intervention Program for Integrated Understanding of Spatial Ability and STEM Education

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate understanding of foundational engineering and technology fields
context.additional_context: A program focused on enhancing STEM knowledge acquisition efficiency through spatial visualization training for professionals

learning_goals: Learners can improve short-term memory retention of engineering-related information by 20% or more through spatial visualization training within 8 weeks
Learners can present solutions to real-world STEM problems by applying spatial reasoning skills in project-based assessments
Learners can integrate spatial ability training tools with language learning content in smartphone-based self-directed learning environments

resources: Mobile App for Spatial Visualization Training
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
